channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain opposite Little Ashley Court, Ryeworth Rd also blocked, 5th April

item.title: How come non disabled people are discriminated against, 5th April
item.description:
I need a wee!!! I assume that the by closing the toilets you are encouraging me to go behind a bush or in somebody's front garden or in the park. Whereas if I was a disabled person I could do it properly. Shame on you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Imperial Square, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More dog fouling, 5th April
item.description:
More dog fouling today, it’s really becoming a daily occurrence. In addition to clearing it, would it be possible to deploy enforcement officers in the St Paul’s area please? It’s all very well having signs saying £1k fines, but if it’s never enforced the behaviour of a few individuals will continue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57B, Marle Hill Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: PROW blocked by locked gate and overgrow bushes, 5th April
item.description:
PROW blocked by locked gate and overgrow bushes. There is a relatively new way marker and post pointing to the PROW that is inaccessible due to a locked gate and overgrown bushes. The concern here is that is the PROW is not re-instated this could be lost. Consultation with the property owner may need to be had. Looking at OS Maps this is still a valid PROW. This has been reported before, however no action appears to have taken place.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malleson Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
